WorkItem.Description:
Default style is supported in the Excel2007 reader/writer, but not Excel5 reader/writer. This work item addresses support in Excel5 reader.
Â 
Support for default style is important since it also determines the font used for column headings (A B C D...) and row headings (1 2 3 4...)
WorkItem.Summary: Support for default style in PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5
